string-array.name: help_main
string-array.item: •\t Search for a word or tap on the dice to get a new definition.
•\t Press the back arrow to view recent definitions.
•\t When the copy button is pressed, the entire definition would be copied.
•\t Any deletions made cannot be undone.

string-array.name: help_search
string-array.item: •\t Tap on a word to reveal its full definition.
•\t Press the search button to view search history and search suggestions.
•\t Any deletions made cannot be undone.
